sense.name: (Cause to) become normal or return to its normal state; (abstractly) smoothe for consistency of representation.
sense.commentary: Note: thing normalized is almost always abstract.
sense.examples: We should normalize the data we've gathered. The US must normalize relations with China. The agency must normalize the spelling of the word. The patient's condition normalized. The patient normalized.

sense.name: Physically bring to a desired consistency, texture, or hardness by gradually heating and cooling.
sense.examples: Normalize the glass before sending it for assembly. We should normalize the consistency of the solution.
